pages.text: Stasis of the Buff The can give the player the stasis effect, and when the effect lasts, it can give the surrounding "non-friendly units" the chilly effect. $(br2)$(t:Raising these attributes for functional spells increases the benefit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Benefit attributes：$(/t)$(t:Raising the Force can increase gains)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()$(t:Raising the Duration can increase gains)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration$(/t)$()
